name: Screaming Chicken: Ultimate Showdown
description:
Screaming Chicken: Ultimate Showdown is a wacky multiplayer game where you can prove that you rule the roost! Pick up the blaster, it's time to show these bold chickens who are truly worthy of being called the supreme champion!

Multiplayer party madness Chickens are party animals, and so do we all! Choose the game mode to your liking:
  • Team up with another chicken friend in 2vs2 mode and let your opponents scream in horror!
  • There can be only one grand chicken champion! Defeat all your opponents and prove that you are an alpha chicken in FFA PvP mode!
  • The world awaits your triumph! Join the battles against chickens all over the world with the auto matchmaking system!

Use physics, skills and weaponsDid a bomb stick to you? Don't worry, just hug someone. Are you in a hot temper today? Then take another chicken by the scruff of the neck and roast it in lava! Want to enjoy nature? Feed another chicken to a carnivorous plant! Or throw an ice bomb at your opponent and turn on the fan - the icicle will slide off the map! Have a light swords duel or find boxing gloves and show them who’s the master of the Henhouse! If you're lucky enough, you can even find a huge terminator robot and destroy the entire map along with your rivals! With over 40 unique weapons, you can bring your wildest ideas to life and take on your opponents the way you want! Make them scream and grill them out!

Smash! Destroy! Shoot! Use the terrain to outsmart other silly birdies. The entire map is fully destructible, which gives you a whole bunch of opportunities! Blast holes, smash walls, shoot columns, and throw other chickens into the abyss! Have fun, but be careful, and don't get into the trap you made!

Customize me, chick!Wanna be a chicken Cthulhu with a cake? Or maybe a ninja chicken throwing cacti instead of shurikens? Your wish is granted! Customize your stylish chick, pick a bomb, and show your personality to other chickens! But don't forget that some outfits have to be earned. You'll have to pluck and roast a lot of chickens to get them. Become whoever you want, and don't forget to choose your favorite dance! Shake your tail feathers, chick!

Show your creativity!Have you already seen all 130 levels and know them like the back of your hand? Then welcome to the Level Editor, artist! An easy and intuitive interface will allow you to create unique maps and arrange fights on your territory and by your own rules! Legends say that the most talented chicken builders can even claim great rewards...



Add the game to your wishlist so you don't miss out on the most screaming chicken fight ever! Buck buck bacaw!
